section_title:
11c07 - Construction:
connection of water or sewer pipe.
text:
Activities such as
excavating, backfilling, and resurfacing of interstate streets and highways are
not considered individually covered where the only purpose of this construction
work is to connect water or sewer pipes leading from private dwellings or other
nonproduction facilities with a main line.
html: Activities such as excavating, backfilling, and resurfacing of interstate streets and highways are not considered individually covered where the only purpose of this construction work is to connect water or sewer pipes leading from private dwellings or other nonproduction facilities with a main line.
